original_text: The nakedness of thy father's wife's daughter, begotten of thy father, she is thy sister, thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.
korean_text: 네 아버지의 아내가 네 아버지에게 낳은 딸은 네 누이니 너는 그의 하체를 범하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: The nakedness of thy father's wife's daughter
thou shalt not uncover her nakedness
